original_title: Roadside Killer: A Very Special Black Christmas
overview: Stanley Simmons, aka: The Roadside Killer is back for the holidays. It's going to be a Black Christmas for Gwen and Scott Garcia. They find a remote cabin for the night. Unfortunately, the cabin they discover is occupied by a serial killer.
tagline: Christmas gets a little darker this year.
title: Roadside Killer: A Very Special Black Christmas
